958809:0.text: My girlfiends and I ate at O.G. again last night.

958809:1.text: I have to say I have never had a disapointing meal here.

958809:2.text: We could have made a meal of the yummy dumplings from the dumpling menu.

958809:3.text: Luckily we saved room for the BBQ Salmon, Sea Bass and Crispy Duck.

958809:4.text: We got a little tipsy from the sake but isn't that what Saturday nights with the girlfriends are all about?
